basics.name: Andreas Coroiu
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: Recently graduated software engineer with lots of experience in full-stack development due to working through the majority of my studies. Passionate about software as my craftmanship - viewing clean code and architecture as an art. I humbly accept that I can never know everything, but still choose to have it as my dream. I love to ask questions, learn, teach, and when needed - speak up. My personal projects often include embedded programming and automation, but curiosity has taken me to other places as well - feel free to check out my github page. I am currently searching for challenges in new areas such as IoT (e.g. smart home devices), Automation and modern FinTech.

work.summary: Ongoing 2-year project working with an agile team, doing architectural design and implementation. Significantly boosted my knowledge by working together closely with the senior architect assigned to the project.
highlights: Full-stack development using ASP.NET Framework, ASP.NET Core and Angular.
Domain discovery and architectural design together with the senior architect.

work.summary: The thesis project "A Platform for Indoor Localisation, Mapping, and Data Collection using an Autonomous Vehicle" explored how an autonomous robot can be used for collecting positional ground truth data while measuring things such as Wi-Fi signal strength.
highlights: Built a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) using the Robot Operating System (ROS).
Created an easy to use web interface for operating the robot.

work.summary: In-house full-stack development using technologies such as Ruby on Rails, Node.js, PHP, AngularJS, with deployement in AWS.

highlights: Web development in Ruby on Rails.

work.summary: Wordpress theme and plugin development, together with IT support for private customers.
